alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 9:11PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL GOSPER AND DAWSON COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM CDT... At 910 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong wind gusts associated with an approaching cold front extending from near Brewster to 10 miles southeast of Gandy to Wellfleet. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Gothenburg, Willow Island and Cozad. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 209 and 235. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
